message: Let's start fair, I'll take 90%, you get 10%.  We can negotiate further if you want, but I'd rather settle this quickly.
Alice, your offer was quite lopsided.  I'm proposing a more equitable split that reflects the fact time is valuable to both of us. Let's get this settled.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think a 60/40 split is fair, considering the inflation rate is much higher for you. Let's end this now.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. Accept this offer, or I walk away with nothing in the next round.  You'll get nothing either. Don't let greed cloud your judgment.
